channel.title: bookdown on Bookdown and Forcars
channel.description: Recent content in bookdown on Bookdown and Forcars

item.title: Forcats Weather
item.description: Via the package “owmr” from the open weather map we now get a record with 40 entries for the city Kiel. The entries show the weather forecast at a interval of 3h which enabls you to make a prediction for the upcoming 5 days. wetter_kiel <- get_forecast("Kiel", units = "metric") wetter_forecast <- wetter_kiel$list view(wetter_forecast) str(wetter_forecast$weather[5]) ## List of 1 ## $ :'data.frame': 1 obs. of 4 variables: ## ..$ id : int 804 ## .
